name: Anibal · Aguila
bio: I'm a technology specialist, IT administrator and looking become into a full-stack developer. I love learning new technologies and am always looking for ways to challenge myself.
description: As a Technology Specialist skilled with web development and automation, I know I have what it takes to be an impressive performer. Experienced with both front-end and back-end technologies, my skill set is diverse and complementary. I love learning and am always looking for ways to improve my skill set. I am adaptable, driven, and hard-working. Let’s get in touch!
